018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph;
019
020import static java.lang.Math.signum;
021import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
022import static java.util.Collections.emptyList;
023import static java.util.Objects.isNull;
024import static java.util.Objects.nonNull;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNonNullArgument;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNotEmptyArgument;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.createRectangle;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.number;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLConnectorType.IMPLEMENTATION;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLConnectorType.INHERITANCE;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLDocument.SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING;
033
034import java.util.ArrayList;
035import java.util.Collection;
036import java.util.Comparator;
037import java.util.HashMap;
038import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.Map;
041import java.util.Optional;
042
043import org.apiguardian.api.API;
044import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.JavadocError;
045import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
046
047/**
048 *  This class is used to lay out the UML graph.
049 *
050 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
051 *  @version $Id: UMLGraphLayout.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
052 *  @since 0.0.5
053 */
054@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: UMLGraphLayout.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
055@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5")
056public final class UMLGraphLayout
057{
058        /*---------------*\
059    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
060        \*---------------*/
061    /**
062     *  This class is used to lay out the UML graph.
063     *
064     *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
065     *  @version $Id: UMLGraphLayout.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
066     *  @since 0.0.5
067     */
068    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: UMLGraphLayout.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
069    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5")
070    public static final class UMLGraphLayoutRow
071    {
072            /*------------*\
073        ====** Attributes **===================================================
074            \*------------*/
075        /**
076         *  The content of this row.
077         */
078        private final Collection<TypeSymbol> m_Contents = new LinkedHashSet<>();
079
080            /*--------------*\
081        ====** Constructors **=================================================
082            \*--------------*/
083        /**
084         *  Creates a new {@code UMLGraphLayoutRow} object.
085         */
086        UMLGraphLayoutRow() { /* Just exists */ }
087
088            /*---------*\
089        ====** Methods **======================================================
090            \*---------*/
091        /**
092         *  Add an element to this row; this method will not touch the width
093         *  and height attributes for this row.
094         *
095         *  @param  typeSymbol  The new symbol.
096         */
097        public final void addSymbol( final TypeSymbol typeSymbol )
098        {
099            m_Contents.add( requireNonNullArgument( typeSymbol, "typeSymbol" ) );
100        }   //  addSymbol()
101
102        /**
103         *  Distributes the symbols in this row horizontally.
104         *
105         *  @param  maxWidth    The maximum width of the row.
106         */
107        @SuppressWarnings( "MagicNumber" )
108        final void distributeContents( final double maxWidth )
109        {
110            if( m_Contents.size() == 1 )
111            {
112                //---* Place the symbol in the middle of the row *-------------
113                for( final var symbol : m_Contents )
114                {
115                    symbol.setX( (maxWidth - symbol.getDimension().width()) / 2.0 );
116                }
117            }
118            else
119            {
120                final var columnSize = maxWidth / m_Contents.size();
121                if( m_Contents.stream().mapToDouble( s -> s.getDimension().width() ).anyMatch( w -> w > columnSize ) )
122                {
123                    //---* Distribute with equal gaps *------------------------
124                    var pos = SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING / 2.0;
125                    for( final var symbol : m_Contents )
126                    {
127                        symbol.setX( pos );
128                        pos += SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING + symbol.getDimension().width();
129                    }
130                }
131                else
132                {
133                    //---* Distribute to columns *-----------------------------
134                    var pos = columnSize / 2.0;
135                    for( final var symbol : m_Contents )
136                    {
137                        symbol.setX( pos - symbol.getDimension().width() / 2.0 );
138                        pos += columnSize;
139                    }
140                }
141            }
142        }   //  distributeContents()
143
144        /**
145         *  Returns the type symbol for the type with the given name.
146         *
147         *  @param  name    The name for the element.
148         *  @return An instance of
149         *      {@link Optional}
150         *      that holds the desired type symbol.
151         */
152        final Optional<TypeSymbol> findByName( final String name )
153        {
154            requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" );
155
156            final var retValue = m_Contents.stream().filter( e -> e.getTypeElement().getQualifiedName().toString().equals( name ) ).findAny();
157
158            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
159            return retValue;
160        }   //  findByName()
161
162        /**
163         *  Returns the UML class doc in this row.
164         *
165         *  @return The contents of this row.
166         */
167        public final TypeSymbol[] getContents() { return m_Contents.toArray( TypeSymbol[]::new ); }
168
169        /**
170         *  Returns the minimum height of the row; this is the height of the
171         *  highest element in the row.
172         *
173         *  @return The height.
174         */
175        final double getHeight()
176        {
177            final var retValue = m_Contents.stream()
178                .mapToDouble( s -> s.getDimension().height() )
179                .max()
180                .orElse( 0.0 );
181
182            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
183            return retValue;
184        }   //  getHeight()
185
186        /**
187         *  Returns the minimum width of the row; this is calculated as the sum
188         *  of the width of the elements plus the value of
189         *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLDocument#SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING}
190         *  ({@value org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph.UMLDocument#SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING})
191         *  for each gap (with the gaps before the first and after the last do
192         *  have half the size).
193         *
194         *  @return The width.
195         */
196        final double getWidth()
197        {
198            final var retValue = m_Contents.stream()
199                .mapToDouble( s -> s.getDimension().width() )
200                .sum() + m_Contents.size() * SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING;
201
202            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
203            return retValue;
204        }   //  getWidth()
205
206        /**
207         *  Checks if elements were added to this row.
208         *
209         *  @return {@code true} if the row has elements,
210         *      {@code false} otherwise.
211         */
212        public final boolean isNotEmpty() { return !m_Contents.isEmpty(); }
213
214        /**
215         *  Removes the given type symbol from the contents of this row.
216         *
217         *  @param  typeSymbol  The symbol for the type element to remove.
218         *  @return An instance of
219         *      {@link Optional}
220         *      that holds the removed type symbol.
221         */
222        @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
223        final Optional<TypeSymbol> removeSymbol( final TypeSymbol typeSymbol )
224        {
225            Optional<TypeSymbol> retValue = Optional.empty();
226            if( m_Contents.remove( requireNonNullArgument( typeSymbol, "typeSymbol" ) ) )
227            {
228                retValue = Optional.of( typeSymbol );
229            }
230
231            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
232            return retValue;
233        }   //  removeSymbol()
234    }
235    //  class UMLGraphLayoutRow
236
237        /*------------*\
238    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
239        \*------------*/
240    /**
241     *  The current row.
242     */
243    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
244    private UMLGraphLayoutRow m_CurrentRow = null;
245
246    /**
247     *  The UML document.
248     */
249    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
250    private final UMLDocument m_Document;
251
252    /**
253     *  The registry of connectors that will be terminated by the class with
254     *  the given name.
255     */
256    private final Map<String,List<UMLConnector>> m_EndingConnectors = new HashMap<>();
257
258    /**
259     *  The row for class objects that do not have parents. These are the class
260     *  {@link java.lang.Object}
261     *  and all interfaces that do not extend other interfaces.
262     */
263    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
264    private final UMLGraphLayoutRow m_NoParentRow;
265
266    /**
267     *  The rows for this layout.
268     */
269    private final List<UMLGraphLayoutRow> m_Rows = new ArrayList<>();
270
271    /**
272     *  The registry of connectors that will originate at the class with the
273     *  given name.
274     */
275    private final Map<String,List<UMLConnector>> m_StartingConnectors = new HashMap<>();
276
277        /*--------------*\
278    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
279        \*--------------*/
280    /**
281     *  Creates a new {@code UMLGraphLayout} object.
282     *
283     *  @param  document    The UML document.
284     */
285    public UMLGraphLayout( final UMLDocument document )
286    {
287        m_Document = requireNonNullArgument( document, "document" );
288        m_NoParentRow = new UMLGraphLayoutRow();
289        m_Rows.add( m_NoParentRow );
290    }   //  UMLGraphLayout()
291
292        /*---------*\
293    ====** Methods **==========================================================
294        \*---------*/
295    /**
296     *  Adds a connector to the registry of connectors ending on the given type
297     *  symbol.
298     *
299     *  @param  typeSymbol  The symbol.
300     *  @param  connector   The connector.
301     */
302    public final void addEndingConnector( final TypeSymbol typeSymbol, final UMLConnector connector )
303    {
304        final var key = requireNonNullArgument( typeSymbol, "typeSymbol").getQualifiedName();
305
306        final var connectors = m_EndingConnectors.computeIfAbsent( key, k -> new ArrayList<>() );
307        connectors.add( requireNonNullArgument( connector, "connector") );
308    }   //  addEndingConnector()
309
310    /**
311     *  Creates a clippath from the given coordinates and add that to the UML
312     *  document.
313     *
314     *  @param  x   The x coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle.
315     *  @param  y   The y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle.
316     *  @param  width   The width of the rectangle.
317     *  @param  height  The height of the rectangle.
318     *  @return The id for the clippath element.
319     */
320    public final String addClippath( final double x, final double y, final double width, final double height )
321    {
322        final var clipRectangle = createRectangle( number( x ), number( y ), number( width ), number( height ) );
323        final var retValue = m_Document.addClippath( clipRectangle );
324
325        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
326        return retValue;
327    }   //  addClippath()
328
329    /**
330     *  Adds a connector to the registry of connectors starting at the given
331     *  type symbol.
332     *
333     *  @param  typeSymbol  The class symbol.
334     *  @param  connector   The connector.
335     */
336    public final void addStartingConnector( final TypeSymbol typeSymbol, final UMLConnector connector )
337    {
338        final var key = requireNonNullArgument( typeSymbol, "typeSymbol").getQualifiedName();
339
340        final var connectors = m_StartingConnectors.computeIfAbsent( key, k -> new ArrayList<>() );
341        connectors.add( requireNonNullArgument( connector, "connector") );
342    }   //  addStartingConnector()
343
344    /**
345     *  Creates a connector for the given parent and child.
346     *
347     *  @param  parent  The parent.
348     *  @param  child   The child.
349     */
350    public final void createConnector( final TypeSymbol parent, final TypeSymbol child )
351    {
352        requireNonNullArgument( parent, "parent" );
353        requireNonNullArgument( child, "child" );
354
355        final var type = !child.isInterface() && parent.isInterface() ? IMPLEMENTATION : INHERITANCE;
356        final var connector = new UMLConnector( type, parent, child );
357        m_Document.addConnector( connector );
358        addEndingConnector( parent, connector );
359        addStartingConnector( child, connector );
360    }   //  createConnector()
361
362    /**
363     *  Distribute the elements in the layout.
364     */
365    @SuppressWarnings( "MagicNumber" )
366    public final void distribute()
367    {
368        //---* Make sure that parents and children are not in the same row *---
369        var changed = true;
370        List<UMLGraphLayoutRow> rowMirror = new ArrayList<>( m_Rows );
371        while( changed )
372        {
373            changed = false;
374            final List<UMLGraphLayoutRow> rowBuffer = new ArrayList<>();
375            for( final var row : rowMirror )
376            {
377                UMLGraphLayoutRow optionalRow = null;
378                for( final var typeSymbol : row.getContents() )
379                {
380                    final var hasChildInThisRow = stream( typeSymbol.getTypeElement().getChildTypes() )
381                        .anyMatch( c -> row.findByName( c.getQualifiedName().toString() ).isPresent() );
382                    if( hasChildInThisRow )
383                    {
384                        if( isNull( optionalRow ) ) optionalRow = new UMLGraphLayoutRow();
385                        optionalRow.addSymbol( typeSymbol );
386                        changed = true;
387                    }
388                }
389                if( nonNull( optionalRow ) )
390                {
391                    rowBuffer.add( optionalRow );
392                    for( final var typeSymbol : optionalRow.getContents() )
393                    {
394                        row.removeSymbol( typeSymbol );
395                    }
396                }
397                rowBuffer.add( row );
398            }
399            rowMirror = rowBuffer;
400        }
401        m_Rows.clear();
402        m_Rows.addAll( rowMirror );
403
404        //---* Determine the maximum row length *------------------------------
405        //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
406        final var graphWidth = m_Rows.stream()
407            .mapToDouble( UMLGraphLayoutRow::getWidth )
408            .max()
409            .getAsDouble();
410
411        //---* Distribute the symbols in the rows *----------------------------
412        m_Rows.forEach( r -> r.distributeContents( graphWidth ) );
413
414        for( final var row : m_Rows )
415        {
416            for( final var symbol : row.getContents() )
417            {
418                if( symbol.getPosition().x() == 0.0 ) throw new JavadocError( "Symbol x coordinate is 0.0" );
419            }
420        }
421
422        //---* Calculate the positions for the elements *----------------------
423        final Comparator<UMLConnector> endPosSorter = ( c1, c2) -> (int) signum( c1.getChildTypeSymbol().getPosition().x() - c2.getChildTypeSymbol().getPosition().x() );
424        final Comparator<UMLConnector> startPosSorter = ( c1, c2) -> (int) signum( c1.getParentTypeSymbol().getPosition().x() - c2.getParentTypeSymbol().getPosition().x() );
425        var y = SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING / 2.0;
426
427        for( final var row : m_Rows )
428        {
429            for( final var symbol : row.getContents() )
430            {
431                final List<UMLConnector> startingConnectors = new ArrayList<>( m_StartingConnectors.getOrDefault( symbol.getQualifiedName(), emptyList() ) );
432                final List<UMLConnector> endingConnectors = new ArrayList<>( m_EndingConnectors.getOrDefault( symbol.getQualifiedName(), emptyList() ) );
433                startingConnectors.sort( startPosSorter );
434                endingConnectors.sort( endPosSorter );
435                symbol.setY( y );
436                final var use = symbol.createUse( startingConnectors, endingConnectors );
437                m_Document.addUse( use );
438            }
439            y += row.getHeight() + SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING * 2.0;
440        }
441
442        //---* Set the document dimensions *-----------------------------------
443        m_Document.setDimension( graphWidth, y + SVG_ELEMENT_SPACING / 2.0 );
444    }   //  distribute()
445
446    /**
447     *  Call this method if all elements were added to the current row.
448     *
449     *  @param  atEnd   {@code true} if the row should be added to the
450     *      end, {@code false} if it should be added to the beginning of the
451     *      row's list.
452     */
453    public final void finishRow( final boolean atEnd )
454    {
455        if( nonNull( m_CurrentRow ) && m_CurrentRow.isNotEmpty() )
456        {
457            if( atEnd )
458            {
459                m_Rows.add( m_CurrentRow );
460            }
461            else
462            {
463                m_Rows.add( 1, m_CurrentRow );
464            }
465        }
466        m_CurrentRow = null;
467    }   //  finishRow()
468
469    /**
470     *  Returns a reference to the
471     *  {@link UMLDocument}
472     *  this instance of layout was created with.
473     *
474     *  @return The UML document.
475     */
476    public final UMLDocument getDocument() { return m_Document; }
477
478    /**
479     *  Returns a reference to the row that holds the class objects that does
480     *  not have parents.
481     *
482     *  @return The row for parent-less class objects.
483     */
484    public final UMLGraphLayoutRow getNoParentRow() { return m_NoParentRow; }
485
486    /**
487     *  Creates a new row for the layout; it is not yet added.
488     *
489     *  @return The new row.
490     */
491    public final UMLGraphLayoutRow newRow()
492    {
493        final var retValue = new UMLGraphLayoutRow();
494        m_CurrentRow = retValue;
495
496        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
497        return retValue;
498    }   //  newRow()
499}
500//  class UMLGraphLayout
501
